info.sourceTextContent: Casos hay en que por interesado que parezca el narrador en faltar á la verdad, no es probable que lo haya hecho, porque descubierta en breve la mentira, sin recurso para paliarla, se convertiria contra él de una manera ignominiosa.
info.suspiciousTextContent: There are cases in which the narrator that seems interested in not telling the truth, it is unlikely you have done, because soon discovered the lie, without recourse to alleviate it, would become against him in a disgraceful manner
